title: loggin in
body: I cant log into my account it keeps saying an unexpected error occurred while trying to log in and I have everything correct and ive updated to patch 7.11

replies.body: That's kind of odd. I pulled up your account and it looks like there might have been something a little suspicious going on. I don't want to give out any of your personal info here on the boards so reach out to our [**accounts team**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and they'll be able to go over everything with you in your ticket.
